projects.name: oktoLIVE!
projects.description: oktoLIVE! is a live TV variety show focusing on kids and the youth of  today. The show is produced by MediaCorp, Singapore’s leading media company and  the only terrestrial TV broadcaster.
role”:”Sole Developer

projects.name: Lightning@SG!
projects.description: Lightning@SG is the app that provides you with the current lightning  situation in Singapore. Developed by National Environment Agency (NEA), this app  uses lightning information from the latest lightning detection and location system
role”:”Lead Developer

projects.name: PoGo
projects.description: PoGo let user write a poem over a selected background image. The image may be a photo taken with the iPad or an image chosen from bundled images or the camera roll. Project owner may add collaborators to their projects and use the built-in text chat feature to communicate with each other. All collaborators may contribute to the poem. The text input of each collaborator is marked by a different font colour for ease of tracking.
role”:”Lead Developer

projects.name: Rent Far East
projects.description: A catalogue app that will display all the information of the company properties including latest pictures, virtual tours and panoramic views of the residential, business space, industrial and medical suites.
role”:”Lead Developer

projects.name: M1 Learning Centre
projects.description: An app that will showcase all the available pdf and epubs downloadable by the user. The user can read and put highlights, annotations and bookmarks on the downloaded books.
role”:”Lead Developer

projects.name: Qooco Talk
projects.description: You will improve by leaps and bounds as Qooco Talk's immersivelearning environment will keep you engaged with fun, effective exercises that are fully interactive. You will click, listen, observe and most importantly speak.
role”:”Developer

projects.name: NEA–Life Cycle Cost Calculator
projects.description: While energy efficient models may have higher purchase price thanless efficient ones, they tend to have lower life cycle costs due to the lower electricity costs over their lifespan.
role”:”Lead Developer

projects.name: Grammar Police– Chung Cheng Division
projects.description: Use the Grammar Police App to capture evidence of instances whereEnglish were used wrongly, then offer your corrections by commenting on the evidence.With its social networking functions, you and your friends can share, rate and comment on each others’ evidence and corrections. The app can also record where the evidence was captured.
role”:”Lead Developer

projects.name: iNAPFA – Catholic High
projects.description: iNAPFA let teachers record students’ NAPFA trials and actual testresults on the spot without the needs for paper. Results are wirelessly uploaded and stored on a server. Results and reports can be retrieved from iNAPFA web site. Points and awards are automatically calculated based on results and the age of the student. iNAPFA helps to improve productivity and save the environment.
role”:”Lead Developer

projects.name: We Welcome Families
projects.description: Organized by the Business for Families Council (BFC) to display the exciting promotions and let the user join the photo contest by taking the photo from iphone.
role”:”Lead Developer

projects.name: Wireless@SG Connect
projects.description: M1 Utility that can connect to wireless@SG seamlessly, the app is capable of getting the password through SMS on iphone and through request on iPad. Uses encrypted data for web to mobile communication
role”:”Lead Developer

projects.name: Connector - TnD
projects.description: Connector is a cloud-based application for location-based event reporting and message dissemination. The service supports a wide range of location-aware devices including smart phones, wireless routers and other GPS devices. It is suitable for businesses and organizations of all sizes as well as for individuals.
role”:”Lead Developer

work.summary: Scoping, Designing, Development, System Integration and Testing of new software and hardware components. Identify, track and find solutions for bugs of the game. Make procedural documentations and test plans

projects.name: Eye-Twister
projects.description: A game application where the user needs to find the differencebetween the vector drawing.
role”:”Lead Developer

projects.name: iClimbs
projects.description: An iOS application for bicycle climbers that draws a slope graph of the certain place to be climbed. It calculates the speed, number of teeth for the gears, distance and the pitch angle. In addition it will provide local and online libraries of available climbs which can be downloaded.
role”:”Lead Developer

projects.name: AQARIUS
projects.description: A game application that can be compared to Ricochet, it is a break out game where the player needs to complete each level with various kinds of bricks (gems, bomb, power up bricks, shell brick that produces pearl when hit for additional points and randomly releases various power ups). The user will be using a real bicycle to control the ball catcher. Screenshots can be provided if needed.
role”:”Lead Developer

The user will be using a real bicycle to control the ball catcher. Screenshots can be provided if needed.
role”:”Lead Developer

This is a dll wrapper that will take its role as a bridge between 3dgamestudio (Lite-C) and the driver dll of the hardware to get and set all it’s attributes like the real speed of the bicycle, cadence speed and the brake resistance.
role”:”Lead Developer
